Serves San Leandro, San Lorenzo or Hayward residents 

Monday – Friday: 12pm-5pm

Can pick up food 2x per month.  The 1st – 15th AND 16th – 31st of the month

If new client, to register please take the following (arrive no later than 4pm):

  • any form of ID for every person in household (including children)
  • proof of address (within the past 30 days)
  • Must be a resident of San Leandro, San Lorenzo or Hayward

**Please bring your own bags or cart
